Key Arguments: The legislation will further restrict freedom of speech and expression.
The government will use these powers to suppress dissent.
Local governments, like Moonee Valley City Council, are already attempting to use this bill to silence opposition.
The bill is seen as a tool for authoritarian control rather than addressing misinformation.
Notable Quotes: The lack of freedom of speech/expression over the last few years has been bad enough without these powers, giving the government these powers is only going to make things worse.
This will just be used by the various federal, state and local governments to further eradicate dissent.
The authoritarian councillors and parliamentarians in favour of this don't care about incorrect speech, they only care about speech that proves them wrong or makes them look bad.
